languages.text: {n}Абеляр осуждающе качает головой, однако во взгляде его читается понимание.{/n} "Вот потому на пустотных кораблях кланы целиком в одном сегменте работают... как бы ни был верен слуга Императора своему долгу, из-за семейных связей могут начать нарушать регламент и порядки".

{n}Abelard shakes his head disapprovingly, but his eyes are understanding.{/n} "That is why all members of a voidship clan share the same employment. No matter how devoted a servant of the Emperor is to their duty, there is always the danger that family ties might disrupt regulations and order."
languages.original_text: {n}Абеляр осуждающе качает головой, однако во взгляде его читается понимание.{/n} "Вот потому на пустотных кораблях кланы целиком в одном сегменте работают... как бы ни был верен слуга Императора своему долгу, из-за семейных связей могут начать нарушать регламент и порядки".

traits.locale_text: {n}Abelard shakes his head disapprovingly, but his eyes are understanding.{/n} "That is why all members of a voidship clan share the same employment. No matter how devoted a servant of the Emperor is to their duty, there is always the danger that family ties might disrupt regulations and order."

{n}Abelard shakes his head disapprovingly, but his eyes are understanding.{/n} "That is why all members of a voidship clan share the same employment. No matter how devoted a servant of the Emperor is to their duty, there is always the danger that family ties might disrupt regulations and order."

{n}Abelard shakes his head disapprovingly, but his eyes are understanding.{/n} "That is why all members of a voidship clan share the same employment. No matter how devoted a servant of the Emperor is to their duty, there is always the danger that family ties might disrupt regulations and order."

{n}Abelard shakes his head disapprovingly, but his eyes are understanding.{/n} "That is why all members of a voidship clan share the same employment. No matter how devoted a servant of the Emperor is to their duty, there is always the danger that family ties might disrupt regulations and order."

{n}Abelard shakes his head disapprovingly, but his eyes are understanding.{/n} "That is why all members of a voidship clan share the same employment. No matter how devoted a servant of the Emperor is to their duty, there is always the danger that family ties might disrupt regulations and order."

{n}Abelard shakes his head disapprovingly, but his eyes are understanding.{/n} "That is why all members of a voidship clan share the same employment. No matter how devoted a servant of the Emperor is to their duty, there is always the danger that family ties might disrupt regulations and order."

languages.text: {n}Abelard schüttelt missbilligend den Kopf, aber in seinem Blick liegt Verständnis.{/n} "Darum haben alle Mitglieder eines Raumschiffclans denselben Arbeitsplatz. Wie hingebungsvoll ein Diener des Imperators seine Pflicht auch erfüllt, es besteht immer die Gefahr, dass Familienbande Vorschriften und Ordnung gefährden."
languages.original_text: {n}Abelard shakes his head disapprovingly, but his eyes are understanding.{/n} "That is why all members of a voidship clan share the same employment. No matter how devoted a servant of the Emperor is to their duty, there is always the danger that family ties might disrupt regulations and order."

traits.locale_text: {n}Abelard schüttelt missbilligend den Kopf, aber in seinem Blick liegt Verständnis.{/n} "Darum haben alle Mitglieder eines Raumschiffclans denselben Arbeitsplatz. Wie hingebungsvoll ein Diener des Imperators seine Pflicht auch erfüllt, es besteht immer die Gefahr, dass Familienbande Vorschriften und Ordnung gefährden."

languages.text: {n}Abélard désapprouve en secouant la tête, mais son regard est compréhensif.{/n} « Voilà pourquoi à bord d'un vaisseau, tous les membres d'un clan occupent la même fonction. Un serviteur de l'Empereur a beau être dévoué corps et âme à son devoir, il y a toujours un risque que les liens familiaux perturbent les règlements et l'ordre. »
languages.original_text: {n}Abelard shakes his head disapprovingly, but his eyes are understanding.{/n} "That is why all members of a voidship clan share the same employment. No matter how devoted a servant of the Emperor is to their duty, there is always the danger that family ties might disrupt regulations and order."

traits.locale_text: {n}Abélard désapprouve en secouant la tête, mais son regard est compréhensif.{/n} « Voilà pourquoi à bord d'un vaisseau, tous les membres d'un clan occupent la même fonction. Un serviteur de l'Empereur a beau être dévoué corps et âme à son devoir, il y a toujours un risque que les liens familiaux perturbent les règlements et l'ordre. »

languages.text: {n}阿贝拉德不满地摇了摇头，但目光中充满了理解。{/n}“正是因为这个原因，虚空舰上每个氏族的所有成员都做着相同的工作。哪怕帝皇的仆人再怎么忠于职守，一旦牵扯到家族关系，都可能会做出违法乱纪的事情。”
languages.original_text: {n}Abelard shakes his head disapprovingly, but his eyes are understanding.{/n} "That is why all members of a voidship clan share the same employment. No matter how devoted a servant of the Emperor is to their duty, there is always the danger that family ties might disrupt regulations and order."

traits.locale_text: {n}阿贝拉德不满地摇了摇头，但目光中充满了理解。{/n}“正是因为这个原因，虚空舰上每个氏族的所有成员都做着相同的工作。哪怕帝皇的仆人再怎么忠于职守，一旦牵扯到家族关系，都可能会做出违法乱纪的事情。”

languages.text: {n}アベラルドは同意できないといった様子で首を振るが、その目は理解を示している。{/n}「それが、ヴォイドシップの全クルーが同じ仕事を共有している理由ですよ。どれほど職務に忠実な皇帝の下僕であっても、家族の絆が規範と秩序を乱す危険は常にあります」
languages.original_text: {n}Abelard shakes his head disapprovingly, but his eyes are understanding.{/n} "That is why all members of a voidship clan share the same employment. No matter how devoted a servant of the Emperor is to their duty, there is always the danger that family ties might disrupt regulations and order."

traits.locale_text: {n}アベラルドは同意できないといった様子で首を振るが、その目は分かってくれているようだ。{/n}「それが、ヴォイドシップの全クルーが同じ仕事を共有している理由ですよ。どれほど職務に忠実な皇帝の下僕であっても、家族の絆が規範と秩序を乱す危険は常にあります」

languages.text: {n}Abelard sacude la cabeza en señal de desaprobación, pero muestra complicidad en su mirada.{/n} «Por eso todos los miembros de un clan de una nave del vacío comparten el mismo trabajo. No importa lo claro que tenga un sirviente del Emperador su deber, siempre existe la posibilidad de que los lazos familiares alteren el orden y las reglas».
languages.original_text: {n}Abelard shakes his head disapprovingly, but his eyes are understanding.{/n} "That is why all members of a voidship clan share the same employment. No matter how devoted a servant of the Emperor is to their duty, there is always the danger that family ties might disrupt regulations and order."

traits.locale_text: {n}Abelard sacude la cabeza en señal de desaprobación, pero muestra complicidad en su mirada.{/n} «Por eso todos los miembros de un clan de una nave del vacío comparten el mismo trabajo. No importa lo claro que tenga un sirviente del Emperador su deber, siempre existe la posibilidad de que los lazos familiares alteren el orden y las reglas».

languages.text: {n}Abelard, başını onaylamaz gibi sallasa da gözleri anlayış dolu.{/n} "Bu yüzden bir uçsuz gemisi klanının tüm üyeleri aynı işi paylaşır. İmparator'un bir hizmetkârı, görevine ne kadar bağlı olursa olsun aile bağları yüzünden nizamı tehlikeye atabilir."
languages.original_text: {n}Abelard shakes his head disapprovingly, but his eyes are understanding.{/n} "That is why all members of a voidship clan share the same employment. No matter how devoted a servant of the Emperor is to their duty, there is always the danger that family ties might disrupt regulations and order."

traits.locale_text: {n}Abelard, başını onaylamaz gibi sallasa da gözleri anlayış dolu.{/n} "Bu yüzden bir uçsuz gemisi klanının tüm üyeleri aynı işi paylaşır. İmparator'un bir hizmetkârı, görevine ne kadar bağlı olursa olsun aile bağları yüzünden nizamı tehlikeye atabilir."
